text:
Hi, Nicholas. I'm using the exact same command (with different module name) you mentioned.
`npx hs create LandingHeader`
It created the module perfectly fine, but when I try adding it to the local hubl server, it throws the mentioned error.
Also, please note that I created a different empty directory under the `custom` folder to keep this module and other files separate from demo (vast) theme.
I also updated the root folder in the config file.

I ended up using the `npx watch` command to upload all the files to a sandbox account and test the changes there for the time being.
It would be really nice if I can do it all locally.
